title: Doctor Of The Dead | Paranormal Interview With Heather Leigh
description:
When Heather Leigh Landon was a teenager she began communicating with her deceased grandfather. It was a peaceful connection, one which would help her through various difficulties in life. Soon, she would discover that her grandfather was not the only spirit she would have in her life. Her studies would lead her to have a PhD Metaphysical and Humanistic Studies, with a specialty in Paranormal Science. Today we hear about her studies and experiences.

In Part 2, EXCLUSIVE TO GRAVE KEEPERS! Become one here: http://www.patreon.com/thegravetalks

What was Heathers goal in getting a PhD Metaphysical and Humanistic Studies, with a specialty in Paranormal Science?

What kind of experiments has Heather done when studying the paranormal?

Does Heather believe that there are demonic forces at play in our society?Â
